title: Council Regulation (EC) No 20/2000 of 17 December 1999 amending Regulation (EC) No 1255/96 temporarily suspending the autonomous Common Customs Tariff duties on certain industrial and agricultural products
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 20/2000
of 17 December 1999
amending Regulation (EC) No 1255/96 temporarily suspending the autonomous Common Customs Tariff duties on certain industrial and agricultural products
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EC) No 1255/96 shall be replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 January 2000.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 December 1999.
For the Council
The President
K. HEMILĂ
(1) OJ L 158, 29.6.1996, p. 1. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1381/1999 (OJ L 165, 30.6.1999, p. 1).
